content.rendered:
Directed by Brian McGinn. Abigail Fuller. Clay Jeter. Zia Mandviwalla. Danny O’Malley

Cast Leo Bianco( Self – Chris’ Father1 episode, 2022 ). Mia Bianco( Self – Chris’ Wife1 episode, 2022 ). Chris Bianco( Self – Pizzeria Bianco – Phoenix, AZ1 episode, 2022 ). Gabriele Bonci( Self1 episode, 2022 ). Katie Parla( Self1 episode, 2022 ). Ed Levine( Self – Founder, Serious Eats1 episode, 2022 ). Elisia Menduni( Self1 episode, 2022 ). Francesco Bianco( Self – Chris’ Mother1 episode, 2022 ). Brett Anderson( Self – Food Writer, The New York Writer1 episode, 2022 ). Ann Kim( Selfunknown episodes ). Sarah Minnick( Selfunknown episodes ). Franco Pepe( Selfunknown episodes ). Yoshihiro Imai( Selfunknown episodes)

Language English

Producers Andrew Fried. David Gelb. Brian McGinn. Talin Parseghian Middleton. Danny O’Malley. Lauren Schwartz. Ben Konigsberg. Marina Nieto

Production Boardwalk Pictures. Supper Club.

Certificate 15+

Season 1

Episodes 6
